titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain viscose rayon yarn.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/22/1997--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2000, the duty on artificial filament yarn (other than sewing thread) of viscose rayon.
